actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide that the provisions of the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 shall govern certain claims for annuities, supplemental annuities, and other benefits which currently are governed by the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974.

summary.text: Provides that the provisions of the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 shall govern annuity, supplemental annuity, and benefit claims currently governed by the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 for those individuals who did not become eligible for such benefits until December 31, 1974.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the provisions of the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 shall govern certain claims for annuities, supplemental annuities, and other benefits which currently are governed by the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974.
